name: Monster Clinic
description:
THIS IS NOT A GAME. it's a visual novel. if you came in here expecting anything else, then i'm sorry but you'll have to wait till next time or play some of the other games the team for this project has made. but if you stayed, then thanks in advance for reading!

TH:E_:PL:OT

Doctor Mark R. Felestien is a professional psychiatrist with a clinic down town. He’s stern and usually straight to business with people often not letting emotions show, and he’s been known for being a great listener. His favorite hobbies include writing and watching movies. He has a pet dog named Terry that he loves very much. and today, a ghost enters his clinic, asking for therapy.

HO:W_:TO:_R:EA:D_

  • Left mouse button, or space key.

CR:ED:IT:S_

  • Moe Anguish - Writing, artwork, coding / TWITTER /
  • LarryNachos - Music / KOFI / BANDCAMP / TWITTER / SOUND CLOUD /

CR:EA:TO:R_:NO:TE:S_

I made this game in about a week. i initially wrote this story as a part of a larger project, but i took down the commercial / larger aspects to focus on the story more. this project is deeply personal. that's not to say i'm projecting my problems onto the ghost, but it is to say i understand his suffering and we're not very different.

I hope you can enjoy this project as much as i did. and thank you for playing.
